actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Communications, Technology, and the Internet.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Communications, Technology, and the Internet

official_title: To amend the Digital Television Transition and Public Safety Act of 2005 to provide for a coupon program for television antennas.

summary.text: DTV Transition Assistance Act - Amends the Digital Television Transition and Public Safety Act of 2005 to require the Assistant Secretary for Communication of the Department of Commerce, subject to limitations, to implement and administer a program through which U.S. households may obtain coupons toward the purchase of a television antenna.

titles.title: To amend the Digital Television Transition and Public Safety Act of 2005 to provide for a coupon program for television antennas.
